Change log
==========

0.0.2 (2014-01-02)
------------------

 - Improve documentation
 - Try to connect to Docker on `tcp://localdocker:4243` and a UNIX socket in addition to `localhost`.
 - Improve `fig up` behaviour
 - Add confirmation prompt to `fig rm`
 - Add `fig build` command

0.0.1 (2013-12-20)
------------------

Initial release.
